root.name: Dora the Explorer: Super Spies
root.description: OverviewDora and Boots are super spies and they find out that Tico has a rocket car but Swiper over hears them and plans to steal it.Dora and Boots now have to rush to get to Tico's workshop before Swiper gets there to stop him. You play through 6 worlds with 3 level in each world. You must collect 3 big gems to open the door to the next level. Though out the game you will get gadgets to assist you. Glasses that let you walk through objects, grapple, rocket shoes, key cards and bubbles.
